description:
UPDATE: BRAND NEW AS OF MARCH 2015

THIS COURSE PRICE WILL ONLY BE AT $49 FOR A LIMITED TIME, SO GET IT TODAY!

JOIN THE OVER 600 STUDENTS LEARNING EYE MAKEUP TODAY!

INCLUDED IN THIS COURSE:

  • OVER 3 HOURS OF IN-DEPTH PERSONAL INSTRUCTION
  • INSTRUCTOR SUPPORT DURING AND AFTER COMPLETION OF THIS COURSE
  • FREE ACCESS TO NEWLY UPDATED LECTURES WITHIN THIS COURSE
  • LIFETIME ACCESS!
  • NO RISK! 30-DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE

DO YOU WANT TO LEARN HOW TO CREATE FLAWLESS EYE MAKEUP?

  • Learn from a professional easy to follow steps to quickly and simply apply everyday eye makeup.
  • Have you ever wanted to know how makeup artists make applying eye makeup look so easy and flawless?
  • Ever wonder what you're doing wrong when you're putting your eye makeup on?
  • Do you avoid wearing makeup because you don't know how to apply it?
  • Do you struggle with putting your makeup on everyday because it never looks right?
  • Are you curious as to what eye makeup to buy as there are so many choices?

Many people struggle with the very same things. Join them in discovering the secrets of a professional makeup artist!

I have spent years teaching everyday people every day how to apply eye makeup in easy to follow steps that give them the ability to recreate it.

Many of the common struggles that I have heard are:

  • “How do you put on mascara without poking yourself in the eye?"
  • “When I wear eyeliner I look like a raccoon!"
  • “When I wear eyeliner it makes my eyes look smaller."
  • “My makeup doesn't look as good as when makeup artists do it, what am I doing wrong?"
  • and many more…

WITH THIS COURSE YOU GET SOLUTIONS TO YOUR EYE MAKEUP STRUGGLES!

I'm Laura Hix, professional makeup artist and instructor, and I will teach you how to feel comfortable creating basic eye makeup that you can use everyday or for a night out. I teach you how to adapt my instruction to any eyeshape by teaching the 'why' as well as the 'how' to each step in creating that perfect eye look.

I also cover everything from basic skincare and the need to prep the skin as well as teaching on what to look for in products that will best suit your needs. Your tools are also important to unlocking the secrets of eye makeup. I cover what each brush is used for and how to use it.

NOW IS THE TIME...

Take action now! Master these essential techniques today and stop being the wallflower at the next party!
title: Makeup Basics: Learn Eye Makeup Today!
